name: Hungry Evo
description:
Help Evo evolve by grabbing fruits from the trees along the never ending path!

A simple adventure game created for the Go Godot Jam 3.

Grab Evo's hand and drag it to get some fruits.

Don't hit the trees. It hurts :(

Evolve.

The game is also available on gotm.io and on Google Play.

*Google Play version is currently undergoing the post release review process and might not be available yet.
